holidays.title: National Bingo Day
holidays.description: Nearly everyone who grew up during the late 20th century is familiar with Bingo.

holidays.title: National Sunglasses Day
holidays.description: Grab your best sunglasses and make waves at the pool, beach, or walking down the street.

holidays.title: Attwari
holidays.description: Let us join the Tharu people in celebrating the Attwari festival to promote love and unity.

holidays.title: ​Day of Arafah
holidays.description: Pilgrimage is a pillar of Islam, so the Day of Arafah holds much weight for Muslims.

holidays.title: Day of National Unity (Tajikistan)
holidays.description: Prepare to learn about the history and traditions of Tajikistan's Day of National Unity.

holidays.title: Day of Turkmen Workers of Culture and Art
holidays.description: Today, we salute the Turkmen culture and art workers for their significant contributions to Turkmen society.

holidays.title: Decide to be Married Day
holidays.description: Hesitate no more to pop the question "Will you marry me?" to your other half.

holidays.title: Djibouti Independence Day
holidays.description: There is something special about Djibouti. Join us and explore the pages of its history.

holidays.title: Helen Keller Day
holidays.description: Celebrating the life and achievements of Helen Keller, who overcame blindness and deafness.

holidays.title: Micro Small and Medium Sized Enterprises Day
holidays.description: Let us use this day to learn more about business and entrepreneurial spirit.

holidays.title: National HIV Testing Day
holidays.description: This day raises awareness about the importance of testing for HIV and getting an early diagnosis.

holidays.title: National Ice Cream Cake Day
holidays.description: Get excited about this amazing union of frozen yumminess with us.

holidays.title: National Jim Day
holidays.description: It's time to recognize and give thanks to all the Jims in your life and worldwide.

holidays.title: National Onion Day
holidays.description: Let us celebrate this auspicious day by planting onions and, of course, eating them!

holidays.title: National Orange Blossom Day
holidays.description: The orange blossom adds a wonderful citrusy fragrance to various products.

holidays.title: National PTSD Awareness Day
holidays.description: We talk about PTSD, a complex disorder caused by experiencing or witnessing trauma.

holidays.title: National Women’s Fly Fishing Day
holidays.description: Women can do anything they set their minds to, and that includes fly fishing!

holidays.title: Tajikistan Unity Day
holidays.description: Today, we join the people of Tajikistan in commemorating an important milestone in their history.

holidays.title: Andrea Russett’s Birthday
holidays.description: Andrea Russett makes her own music and has a huge fan following. She is going places!

holidays.title: Chandler Riggs’s Birthday
holidays.description: Chandler Riggs' mother, Gina Ann, and brother, Grayson, have appeared in the television series as extras.

holidays.title: Ed Westwick’s Birthday
holidays.description: Westwick has acted his way into the hearts of his fans since 2006.

holidays.title: Gage Bills’s Birthday
holidays.description: We are celebrating Gage Bills, the TikTok star who has captured the hearts of millions worldwide.

holidays.title: H.E.R.’s Birthday
holidays.description: With her wonderful R&B hits, H.E.R. has taken the music world by storm!

holidays.title: Helen Keller’s Birthday
holidays.description: This author and activist broke down all the obstacles that tried to stop her!

holidays.title: Khloé Kardashian’s Birthday
holidays.description: From a reality superstar to one of the highest-paid influencers, there’s nothing Khloé Kardashian can’t do.

holidays.title: Lauren Jauregui’s Birthday
holidays.description: Today, we’re honoring the talented Lauren Jauregui, a former member of the girl group Fifth Harmony.

holidays.title: P.I.BANG’s Birthday
holidays.description: This famous rapper has made headlines ever since he started releasing music.

holidays.title: Spock’s Birthday
holidays.description: Music producer, D.J., entertainer, and comedian, Spock has so much talent for one person!

holidays.title: Tobey Maguire’s Birthday
holidays.description: This actor has had phenomenal success as an actor and has always been a go-getter!
